article_title: Marco Rubio says he would defend country, Constitution at West Columbia presidential forum
article_text:
GOP presidential hopeful is on a two-day swing through the Palmetto State

Vows to undo President Obama’s executive orders

‘We need a place in the world where we can take dangerous terrorists’

article_metadata.news-keywords: sc, politics, Alan Wilson, Marco Rubio, health care, Obama, constitution, gun control, obamacare, religious liberty, judges, gitmo, brookland baptist
article_metadata.description: U.S. Sen. Marco Rubio pitched himself as a defender of the U.S. Constitution and the country Friday night before a receptive crowd in West Columbia.
article_metadata.title: Marco Rubio says he would defend country, Constitution at West Columbia presidential forum | The State
